ARABIC: وَإِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبُّكَ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱئْتِ ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When your Lord called out to Musa: 'Go to the wrongdoing people,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: When your Lord called upon Moses: "Go to the wicked people,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (Recount to them about the time) when Your Lord called Moses: "Go to the wrong-doing people,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When Your Lord told Moses to go to the unjust people of the Pharaoh
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And (remember) when your Lord said to Moosa, “Go to the unjust people.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And (remember) when your Lord called Musa (saying): "Go to the people who are wrongdoers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And when your Lord called out to Musa, saying: Go to the unjust people,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And when thy Lord called to Moses, 'Go to the people of the evildoers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And when thy Lord called Moses, saying: Go unto the wrongdoing folk,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: When your Lord called out to Moses, saying, "Go to the wrongdoing people,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And recall what time thy Lord called unto Musa, saying: go thou unto the wrong-doing people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: When your Lord called out to Moses: [saying,] ‘Go to those wrongdoing people,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Behold, thy Lord called Moses: "Go to the people of iniquity,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And (remember) when your Lord called Musa (Moses) (saying): "Go to the people who are Zalimun (polytheists and wrong-doing),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And when your Lord called to Moses, saying: 'Go to the harmdoing nation,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Your Lord called to Moses, “Go to the tyrannical people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [mention] when your Lord called Moses, [saying], "Go to the wrongdoing people -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:10] And, mention, O Muhammad (s), to your people, when your Lord called to Moses, on the night he saw the fire and the bush, [saying]: ‘Go to the wrongdoing folk, as a messenger,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And when thy Lord called Moses) it is also said that this means: and when your Lord commanded Moses, (saying: Go unto the wrong-doing folk) the disbelieving folk,
